byline.contributor: Yamiche Alcindor contributed reporting from Emeryville, Calif., and Amy Chozick from New York.

abstract: Gov Jerry Brown of California endorses Hillary Clinton for in open letter to Democrats and independents as date of presidential primary in state approaches; praises Bernie Sanders, but argues Clinton has greater support among Democrats and stronger chance at defeating Republican Donald Trump in November.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Brown’s endorsement also offered strong praise for Senator Bernie Sanders, Mrs. Clinton’s chief rival for the Democratic presidential nomination.

headline.main: Gov. Jerry Brown Endorses Hillary Clinton Ahead of California Primary
headline.print_headline: California Governor Speaks Up, Endorsing Clinton Week Before Primary

snippet: Mr. Brown’s endorsement also offered strong praise for Senator Bernie Sanders, Mrs. Clinton’s chief rival for the Democratic presidential nomination.
